app.title: Knock Out MDE
app.description: Bespoke boxing apparel and costume design from Medellín, Colombia

home.description: Handcrafted boxing apparel and costumes designed with passion in Medellín, Colombia

about.title: About Knock Out MDE
about.description: Founded in Medellín, Knock Out MDE specializes in creating unique, high-quality boxing apparel and costume designs tailored to each fighter's personality and style.
about.craftText: We combine traditional craftsmanship with innovative design to create striking, durable apparel that stands out in the ring.
about.heritageText: Our designs draw inspiration from Colombia's rich cultural heritage and Medellín's vibrant art scene.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Explore our premium boxing apparel collections, showcasing the finest craftsmanship and design from Medellín, Colombia.
collections.customDescription: Can't find exactly what you're looking for? Let us create something unique just for you.

championship.title: Championship Series
championship.description: Professional-grade apparel designed for champions. Featuring premium materials and bold designs for fighters who demand excellence.

urban.title: Urban Fighter
urban.description: Street-inspired designs with Colombian urban flair. Bold graphics and comfortable cuts make this collection perfect for training and streetwear.

custom.title: Custom Showcase
custom.description: One-of-a-kind designs created for elite fighters. Get inspired by our previous custom creations for your own unique design.

wraps.title: Hand Wraps
wraps.description: Premium cotton hand wraps with signature designs

shorts.title: Training Shorts
shorts.description: Lightweight, durable shorts for training sessions

robes.title: Robes & Walkout Gear
robes.description: Make a statement before the fight even begins

custom.title: Custom Designs
custom.description: Create unique boxing apparel that reflects your personality and style as a fighter.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: We discuss your vision, personal style, and specific requirements for your boxing gear.

design.title: Design
design.description: Our designers create concepts based on your ideas, incorporating Colombian elements if desired.

refinement.title: Refinement
refinement.description: We work with you to refine the design until it's exactly what you envision.

crafting.title: Crafting
crafting.description: Our artisans meticulously create your gear using the finest materials and techniques.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Your custom gear is delivered, ready to make a statement inside and outside the ring.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have questions or ready to start your custom project? Get in touch with us today.

footer.description: Premium boxing apparel and costume design from Medellín, Colombia.

error.notFound: Sorry, we couldn't find what you're looking for.
